MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32am. Our Engineers are on their way to Sandport substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:13am on Wednesday, 14 April 2021
